title: page up/down misaligned
content: I use firefox for reading pdfs a lot, and i would really like to use page up and page down for their proper functions when doing so rather than having to scroll. the issue is these keys dont move a full page height, they are slightly too small. thus the pages quickly become misaligned requiring scrolling to rectify. a very minor but very annoying problem that i assume has a simple fix but i cant figure it out. help with this would be greatly appreciated!
creator: skoe0004

title: My passwords don't save even though I have all the correct boxes checked on settings
content: No matter how many articles I read on how to get my passwords to save, no matter how many times I check the settings yes they're still all correct, after an update (I think) firefox no longer asks to save passwords and doesn't volunteer any information about them.
creator: karenbensonstudios

title: One website will not come up on any browser.
content: One website will not come up on either Firefox or Safari - etsy.com. Did I get locked out? The website is completely empty - no words, no picture, no link.
creator: Pattie.Firestone

title: "Your browser is being managed by your organization" - LInux, No Antivirus, No organization.
content: "Your browser is being managed by your organization" - LInuxMint, No Antivirus, No organization. No idea when or why this started. Please make this go away and never come back. Please don't make me rely entirely on user forums to understand your ridiculously vague messages. Please stop requiring 2-factor authentication in order for me to rely entirely on user forums to understand your ridiculously vague messages.
creator: reg31

title: Trouble with Bookmarks
content:
I'm unable to save bookmarks in most of my folders. I can occasionally get a bookmark saved in one folder, but it will disappear and many folders no matter what I try no bookmark can be saved. I also am unable to export new bookmarks from Chrome to Firefox.

I've tried everything on the 'Can't add, change or save bookmarks - How to fix' page and nothing has worked and it has been incredibly frustrating and I'm not sure where to go from here. Please advise.
creator: ibrie44

title: Cómo buscar en la barra de busqueda de la pagina de inicio sin que me mueva a la barra de direcciones?
content: En la pagina de inicio (la inicial de firefox) al ponerme en el cuadro de busqueda, cuando empiezo a escribir me salta a la barra de direcciones. Cómo hago para seguir escribiendo en la barra de busqueda?

title: Total Webshield. Is it a legitimate product that you recommend?
content: Total Webshield. Is it a legitimate product that you recommend? I’ve been told about this product. Do you recommend it for your Firefox users? Many scams now so I’m just checking. Thanks Sophia Valente

title: Problem activating firefox browser
content: Firefox says that it is now my default browser, which is what I wanted, but my browser is still duckduckgo, and firefox browser is not on the available list of browsers to select as default. I downloaded it. I selected "make it my default browser". But it isn't. It's still duckduckgo.
creator: screaminggeezer

title: Website failing to load or loading slowly
content: Since mid-May I have noticed that Firefox will fail to load various websites, such as, Google, Amazon, or YouTube. I have spoken with my ISP, Verizon, and they report no anomalies with my service and network monitoring shows no drop in internet connectivity. I switched to Microsoft Edge to see if the problem persists but have not run into the same issue, so I believe the fault lies with Firefox. I am actually using Edge to submit this help ticket since I cannot get any webpage to load on Firefox currently. I really enjoy using Firefox, but I have no problem switching back to Chrome or a similar browser.
creator: henrymachado5

title: when opening some yahoo emails it display html code instead of email text
content: when opening some yahoo emails it display html code instead of email text. this just started in the last several days.
